thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I was initially quite skeptical of using a site like this, hence I used PayPal, but was delighted to find that it actually worked! It takes a bit of waiting and phone verification but as soon as that was done, I received my code. I'm actually very impressed. If you're a bit skeptical about PCGameSupply, don't be! They do work and I am very happy with the service I received.
